title: NBA Preview and Angela Rye!
description:
The guys are here to give you what you want - and what you want is NBA Preview picks. Jalen and Jacoby drop their picks for Eastern and Western Conference finalists, as well as the Finals winners, and MVP. Plus! The one and only Angela Rye joins the program, touching on her Seattle hoops roots (Bring back the Sonics!), the latest efforts to boost Brittney Griner's morale on her birthday, and the NFL's effort to make voting more accessible to all. Pull up! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
